item.title: Report X-2025040911
item.description:
Report X-2025040911

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-12T03:42:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-07
  • City: ST LOUIS
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WET CARTON WAS OBSERVED ON MEZZANINE IN HAZMAT PROCESSING AREA. RMP TRANSPORTED CARTON TO DMP WORK AREA FOR ANALYSIS. UPON INSPECTION, LOOSE CAP WAS OBSERVED ON CONTAINER, RESULTING IN SPILLAGE. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED THROUGH DMP/DMN PROCEDURES WITHOUT INCIDENT.
